original_text:
Threshing floor and wine vat shall not feed them,
    and the new wine shall fail them.
korean_text: 타작 마당이나 술틀이 그들을 기르지 못할 것이며 새 포도주도 떨어질 것이요

sentences.original_text: Threshing floor and wine vat shall not feed them
sentences.korean_translation: 타작마당과 포도즙 틀이 그들을 먹이지 못할 것이며

sentences.original_text: and the new wine shall fail them.
